snippet: Washington Redskins Coach Mike Shanahan said there was “no possibility” that Robert Griffin III would play in the preseason, rebuffing the quarterback’s public lobbying effort.
abstract: Washington Redskins quarterback Robert Griffin III will miss entire preseason because of knee issues; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Washington Redskins Coach Mike Shanahan said there was “no possibility” that Robert Griffin III would play in the preseason, rebuffing the quarterback’s public lobbying effort.
